mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_devices (dvc_name, dvc_serial, dvc_image, dvc_buy, dvc_explain, cop_seq, rsc_seq) VALUES (#{dvcName}, #{dvcSerial}, #{dvcImage}, #{dvcBuy}, #{dvcExplain}, #{copSeq}, #{rscSeq})
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM tb_devices WHERE dvc_seq not in( (select rsv_detail from tb_reservations where #{rsvStart} < rsv_end and rsv_end < #{rsvEnd}) union (select rsv_detail from tb_reservations where #{rsvStart} < rsv_start and rsv_end < #{rsvEnd}) union (select rsv_detail from tb_reservations where #{rsvStart} < rsv_start and rsv_start < #{rsvEnd}) union (select rsv_detail from tb_reservations where #{rsvStart} > rsv_start and rsv_end > #{rsvEnd}) union (select rsv_detail from tb_reservations where #{rsvStart} = rsv_start and rsv_end = #{rsvEnd}))
and cop_seq = ${copSeq} and dvc_state = true;
SELECT * FROM tb_devices WHERE dvc_state = true ORDER BY dvc_created DESC LIMIT 5 OFFSET 0
SELECT dvc_name, dvc_serial, dvc_image, dvc_buy, dvc_explain FROM tb_devices WHERE dvc_seq = #{dvcSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_devices SET dvc_name = #{dvcName}, dvc_serial = #{dvcSerial}, dvc_buy = #{dvcBuy}, dvc_explain = #{dvcExplain}, dvc_image = #{dvcImage} WHERE dvc_seq = #{dvcSeq}
